page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE-ETTON 1
page.content: My name is Rachel and I am 11 yrs old. I live at Etton with my mum,dad, brother Duncan and two pet cats,Felix and Smudge.Here is an account of Saturday,13th.July,85. I woke up at 7.20a.m. and lay until 8.00.I made my bed and went downstairs to feed the cats.Then I made a cup of tea and took it upstairs to my lazy parents.We read ghost stories while my brother played on the computer.At 8.30 I dressed into my jodhpurs and went to make eggy bread (bread dipped in egg then fried) for my brother.It's gorgeous! I had my own breakfast, cereals and a raw carrot.Afterwards I washed and cleaned my teeth.Mum and I changed the sheets on the beds and then gathered the library books to return later.We then set off for Sainsbury's,a large food and homeware store in Hessle.(CONT.p.13)
